actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on SBA & SBIC Authority, Minority Enterprise, and General Small Business Problems.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to treat physically handicapped individuals as socially disadvantaged individuals for purposes of business development programs under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to treat physically handicapped individuals as socially disadvantaged individuals for purposes of the Small Business Administration's business development programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to treat physically handicapped individuals as socially disadvantaged individuals for purposes of business development programs under such Act.
